post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Company Name        MSEmploy
Job Category        Technology
Location        Scarborough, Ontario
Position Type        Full-Time, Employee
Experience        2-5 Years Experience
Date Posted        February 21, 2010

Responsibilities
This individual will report to the development and architecture manager and will:
1. Assist with the design of software solutions using the .Net framework (all versions)
2. Assume responsibility for the resolution and correction of program code
3. Participate in the architecture of systems
4. Implement software solutions using the .Net framework (all versions)
5. Assist in the formulation of testing strategies and test automation programming
6. Follow software development best practices
7. Assist lead developers to ensure best quality and coordination of delivery
8. Follow very structured governance policies –within an agile environment!

Requirements
Skills & Attributes
1. Consistent team player, with continuous learning as a habit and the innate desire to solve problems
2. Very strong analytical and troubleshooting skills and a solid understanding of structured programming, object oriented design and service oriented architecture
3. Very strong expertise in .Net (all versions) with C# -with mastery in either WPF or WCF/WF
4. Good application performance and run time behaviour understanding of the .Net framework
5. Good experience of the full software development life cycle from requirements gathering to post-implementation production support, including quality assurance, system integration
6. Self-motivated with the ability to work independently, a go-to person for activities within cross-divisional and cross-functional teams
7. Very good Visual Studio skills (any version, Team Foundation Server knowledge a big plus)

Education/Experience
1. Bachelor degree in a technical field such as computer science, computer engineering or related field a huge advantage
2. MCSD.Net with either MCSE or MCDBA certifications preferred
3. Other programming language experience a definite advantage
4. At least 2 years of hands-on software development
5. At least 1 years of hands-on related software development in either ASP.Net or WinForms
6. Database programming experience on Oracle or MS SQL server a huge plus
7. Experience in the manufacturing and mechanical engineering a plus

Education/Experience
1. Bachelor degree in a technical field such as computer science, computer engineering or related field a huge advantage
2. Current MCDBA with MCSE certifications preferred
3. Other database engineering certifications highly desirable
4. Minimum 10 years of database related professional experience
5. Minimum 6 years of database administration
6. Minimum 4 years of database engineering
7. Minimum 2 years of intense professional engineering database clusters (and their operation)
8. Expert database programming experience on Oracle or MS SQL server a huge plus
9. Experience in manufacturing and mechanical engineering a plus
post.title: .Net Developer
